section.p: ‘Now I need a golden katana,’ says Estragon.

‘It is the sword of one of the knights who serve the Chancellor of the land of Akatsurai, which lies far across the ocean to the south-east. Go, and when you return I will impart the inner arcana of the mystic arts.’
Surely there must be somewhere nearer than Akatsurai where you can get hold of the item you need? .
